attributes.action: Don not subsidize Scottish renewable electricity if it goes independent.
attributes.additional_details: Currently Scotland is allowed funding for renewable energy projects from the UK government. If Scotland goes independent cancels any subsidies and spend it on projects in England and Wales. To make us less dependent on other countries for energy and self sufficient on energy. We should not subsidise the development of renewable electricity in an independent country but spend the the money on the development our own renewable industry.
